name: World of Tanks 3D Model Surface File
summary: Learn about .VISUAL files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: WoT offers a variety of 3D tank models from different nations. Some models include the MS-1 from the USSR, Tiger I L/56 from Germany, M18 Hellcat from the USA, and the Renault FT AC from France. The VISUAL file is used to make the tank appear the same as the tank in real life.
NOTE: The VISUAL format was replaced by the .VISUAL_PROCESSED format with the release of WoT 0.9.10.

description: 3D model surface file used by World of Tanks (WoT), a war game that features battles between tanks; stores texture and material information that covers 3D models used in the game.
